TUTORIAL.SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the Ionic Super Starter
TUTORIAL.SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Ionic Super Starter is a fully-featured Ionic starter with many pre-built pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL.SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Super Starter
TUTORIAL.SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Assemble the various page types you want and remove the ones you don't. We've provided many common mobile app page layouts, like login and signup pages, tabs, and this tutorial page.
TUTORIAL.SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Need help? Check out the Super Starter README for a full tutorial

WELCOME.FIND_PROPERTY: Find your property on the map

ADD_PROPERTY.TITLE: How to find your property?
ADD_PROPERTY.FIND_PROPERTY: Find your property on the map

LINK_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Link
LINK_ACCOUNT.INCORRECT_PASWORD: We are sorry. We haven´t been able to verify your account. Please make sure you have added your details correctly

POSITION_OVERVIEW.DATA_DESCRIPTION: The Airbnb page in which your property appears when searching in Madrid
POSITION_OVERVIEW.PROCESSING_DESCRIPTION: It can takes up to 20 minutes

POSITION.LAST_DAY_PERIOD: This is the last day of a period and your listing does not show due to the minimum number of nights you have specified in your Airbnb settings
POSITION.MINIMUM_NIGTHS_PROBLEM: Your listing can not appear when searching due to the minimum number of nights per booking that you have specified in Airbnb
POSITION.NOT_APPEARS: Your listing does not appear this day in the first 18 pages when searching in '{{value}' without any filters. (It will probably appear if the Airbnb user applies some filters.)

HELP.TITLE: Help
HELP.THANKS: We will get back to you as soon as possible. Thanks for your patience.
